basic_information.scholarship_notes: Seniors graduating in December are eligible to receive full scholarship in their last semester.

description: This fund provides scholarships for students majoring in Fashion Marketing. Eligibility Requirements Must be pursuing an undergraduate degree in Fashion Marketing. Enrolled full-time (12 hours) Minimum 2.75 GPA Two letters of recommendation from faculty Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
